title: The Patexia Network: Connecting Silicon Beach
desc: Join Patexia as we celebrate another successful year pursuing our mission to open the way for innovation. Patexia's work as a hub for entrepreneurs, innovators, investors and legal professionals creates a unique community, and what better way to celebrate than by? . Enjoy  onnect with likeminded professionals and explore opportunities for collaboration. Dress code is business casual. This event is possible thanks to our sponsor Bryan Cave
